title: France panorama. [No. 73/05]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Presidential visit - President Pompidou visits Djibouti and Ethiopia. 2. In the news: Walls of sunshine - tapestries of Jean Picard Le Doux. Car phones - automatic telephones for drivers. 3. Young authors - author Francois-Marie Basnier publishes his third book. 4. Pol Bury - Pol Bury’s kinetic universe.
